jira_collector__No_feature_in_jira.jql: key = ${id} AND type NOT IN (Bug, TR) AND status = Done

jira_collector__Bug.jql: key = ${id} AND type IN (Bug, Task, Sub-task, Story, TR) AND status IN (Closed, Done)

jira_collector__unfinished_tasks.jql: key = ${id} AND status NOT IN (Done, Closed, "CLOSED - NOT REPRODUCABLE", "CLOSED WITHOUT ACTION", Cancelled, FA, FG, F4)

jira_collector__open_bug.jql: component = "${env.JIRA_COMPONENT_LONG_NAME}" AND type IN (Bug, TR) AND status NOT IN (Done, Closed, "CLOSED - NOT REPRODUCABLE", "CLOSED WITHOUT ACTION", Cancelled)

jira_collector__Deprecation_done.jql: key = ${id} AND type = Deprecation AND status = Done

jira_collector__Deprecation_approved.jql: component = "${env.JIRA_COMPONENT_LONG_NAME}" AND type = Deprecation AND status = Approved AND "Start date" <= endOfDay()

jira_collector__Vulnerabilities.jql: key = ${id} AND type IN (Bug, Task, Sub-task, Story, TR) AND status IN (Closed, Done)

jira_collector__Abrupt_nbc.jql: key = ${id} AND type = "Abrupt NBC" AND status IN (Closed, Done)

jira_collector__Nuc.jql: key = ${id} AND type = NUC AND status IN (Closed, Done)
